mapper.insert: insert into dependency (id, repository_id, file_id, name, use_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, repository_id, file_id, name, use_count from dependency
